Text: Iko le̩ He̩ro̩d, ate̩trark,
Oñ i ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Jo̩n kʼi ache baptism le̩ de̩, owñ kwane̩ kwugbo abo ki ku me̩; oñ lef e-le̩ uko̩lo̩ ukpahiu-i ache ef uwñ.
Todu He̩ro̩d gwo̩nyu Jo̩n, i la fʼu ji, oñ i mʼu du atʼunyi uga todu He̩ro̩dias, o̩ya Filip o̩maye-wñ.
Todu Jo̩n ka ñw u kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw e̩ kʼe̩ nʼo̩ n.
I la dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi fʼu kpa, ailo o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ la je̩ ñw u n, todabu kʼi dab akache̩ eju-ma.
Oñ abu kʼo̩do̩ ku ma bi He̩ro̩d muda ko, o̩ma He̩ro̩dias onobule̩ do̩mo̩ atido alumeji-ma i la nyo̩ He̩ro̩d eju.
Ugbo kide̩ i fʼe̩bo̩ go̩ ñw u ka kʼe̩wñ du kʼi abiʼu i adʼu ñw u.
Oñ abu kʼiye-wñ la ko̩ nyefu i kakini, Dʼoji Jo̩n kʼi ache baptism noj o̩kpa ñwu mi emi.
Tak e̩do̩ onu mukpabie̩, ama tod e̩bo̩ kʼi go̩ kpai tod eju abo ku ma chekukane̩ kpenyʼu, i ñwa ñwu ma kʼama du ñw u.
Tak i fʼone̩ kpe̩ amu Jo̩n oji bu ef unyidudu,
oñ ma dʼoji-wñ noj o̩kpa wa ñw u, taku ma mʼu du ñw igbe̩le̩ le̩, tak i mʼu du wʼugbo iye-wñ.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ te̩wa amʼoku-wñ du, oñ ma mʼu du ji, taku ma lewa mʼu du ka ñwu Jisus.
Oñ abu ku Jisus gbo̩ i tʼo̩ko̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le tef aje̩tachi ugbo kʼowñ kate ade̩. Tak e̩gba kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ gbo̩, ma kwʼewo ewo le e̩re̩ tʼo̩ ubi.
Tak abu kʼi dufu wa i fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ lile li. Ejumomi-ma la je̩ ñw u n, oñ i fʼo̩ga ame̩no̩ga-ma che kpa.
Tak e̩gba kʼane̩ lo̩ amako̩che̩-wñ wʼugbo-wñ, ma kakini, Ugbo-i chʼaje̩tachi, iko la legudu me̩; tʼo̩wo̩ amone̩-i no̩ todu ku ma nyʼadogbe adogbe ala e̩wñ ku ma aje̩.
Jisus muda ka ñwu ma kakini, i dʼugbo ku ma kwʼemi alo n, ame̩ ki kʼe̩wñ ñwu ma je̩.
Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, A nʼe̩wñ du emi tʼakala me̩lu kpʼe̩ja meji le n.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Mʼu ko wa ñwu mi emi.

Tak i ñwa ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ku ma chekukane̩ oj egbe oñ i mʼakala me̩lu kpʼe̩ja meji le̩ gba, i mʼeju korʼojale, i fʼaduwa-wñ che; tak i fʼakala le̩ guche̩, oñ i mʼu ko ñw amako̩che̩-wñ, oñ amako̩che̩ mʼu ko ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩.
Tak o̩chaka-ma je̩ oñ efu-ma ko̩. Ma la mʼaje̩bo̩ kʼi ku ma bo̩ ko̩, i che̩ko̩ aligada me̩gweji.
Oñ abo ku ma je̩ la dab aboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu, abobule̩ kpʼabimo̩to̩ la dʼo̩ n.
Tak ababale̩ i kutʼamako̩che̩-wñ ku ma tʼo̩ko̩ ku ma dʼo̩gba-wñ nyʼejudaba, gbogbo tak i tʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ no̩ ku ma lo.
Tak abu kʼi tʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ no̩ owñ kate mute̩gu nyʼibe̩ uwo kʼi chaduwa. Oñ abu kʼane̩ lo̩ owñ kate do̩mo̩.
O̩ko̩ le̩ la kwʼeto̩ba te̩ jiji me̩, akpoli narʼo̩, todu afu aju kwʼo̩gba-wñ awa.
Oñ e̩gba ide e̩ke̩le̩ odu i lule̩ ej ohimini awʼugbo ma.
Oñ abu kʼamako̩che̩ le̩ fʼowñ li abu kʼi alule̩ ej ohimini, ibe-ma mukpatuka, ma kakini, Ibegu de̩! Tak okpo-wñ je̩ ñwu ma kwukwa.
Ama ababale̩ Jisus ko̩la ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ ke, kʼomi de̩, me̩ ki chokpo n.
Oñ Pita dohi ñw u kakini, Ondu, i chʼuwe̩ de̩, e̩ ñwa ñwu mi kʼu wʼugbo we̩ ej omi-i.
Oñ i kakini, Lewa. Taku Pita kwʼef o̩ko̩ tej omi, oñ i kwolule̩ ej omi awʼugbo Jisus;
abu kʼi muda li alu kʼafu aju, i kwochokpo, tak abu kʼi chane̩ elawo̩nye̩ i kwa kakini, Ondu, mʼumi gba.
Oñ ababale̩ Jisus fʼo̩wo̩ nadala agwo̩nyʼu, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ e̩ne̩do̩ ekono re, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩do̩-we̩ deji?
Tak abu ku ma kwotʼo̩ko̩, afu le̩ nye̩do̩.
Oñ abo ku ma jʼef o̩ko̩ le̩ dojikane̩ ñw u, kakini, Ochochi, O̩ma O̩jo̩ uwe̩ che.
Tak abu ku ma mudaba, ma lewa ane̩ Ge̩ne̩sare̩t.
Tak abu kʼaboke̩le̩ ugbo le̩ mejuma owñ, ma fʼuche̩ kpe̩ rʼoj ane̩ le̩ du daka, oñ ma mʼamone̩ ku ma nʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ o̩la chaka ko wʼugbo-wñ.
Taku ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ todu kʼama ki do̩wo̩kado o̩jaja eti afe̩-wñ kate, oñ aluka one̩ ku ma do̩wo̩kado, ache̩ka che ma hioko.
